name: Hideo Kojima's Pachinko Miner Deluxe
description:
Plunge the depths of the pachinko mines in this game inspired by the sad fate of a gaming visionary.

Press space to launch things, hold space to launch them further.

Made in under 24h for the Giant ROM game jam.

Update 12/10/2015:

-Now with sounds!

-Fixed some bugs

-Board now resets once all mystery blocks have been destroyed

everything by Nick Kornek
